评论概述: Light, comfy and ample arm room!
评论详情: Surprisingly, this fit well for being Asian made. I inadvertently ordered a medium, fully expecting to return it. Poly material is very lightweight, but not see-through. Arms are roomy and it’s comfortable. Not bad for $15.
I have a short sleeve shirt I bought this summer. I loved it and how it fits. So bought a long sleeve shirt for work. Comfy and good material. Worth the buy!

评论概述: Fabric pilled and looked fuzzy. After fabric shaved
评论详情: Loved the shirt when I first put it on. Work it for my desk job. By the end of the day it was all fuzzy and had pills al over where the shirt rubbed against the desk. Used a fabric shaver, but still rather fuzzy looking. Not very durable and I don’t want to uses a fabric shaver after each time I wear it

I bought the black which I felt would be the best option given the pattern. It does have some stretch and IMO is soft. I bought a large but I really could have gotten a medium. I am 5’6 and 38C bra size. I like the longer length too!

This blouse is true to size and comfortable to wear. The only issue is the material is not giving like a T-shirt especially in the arms!  Pretty print and have worn many times.

评论概述: This is a Long Sleeve T-Shirt.  That's it.
评论详情: If you get this for a good price, it's fine.  I originally bought this because the model wears it in a way that looks a little more styled than I received.  In fact, I am reviewing it because I wasn't sure it was the same shirt I thought I ordered.  It is.  The G Blue is a really pretty color on me (I am winter skin tone)  The fabric has a slightly distressed look to it to give it some "style" and make it feel less utilitarian.  But it's a long sleeved t-shirt.  It has a standard neckline, and I am slight in frame so I didn't have any issues with the sleeves being tight.  I thought it fit fine for me (5'1", 120 lbs) but it is really a basic.  You can't really "dress" it up.  It just gives off a casual feel.  I will keep it because I got it for relatively cheap, but it's a really standard basic shape and cut.  A shirt for jeans, and that's okay.
I live this shirt. It’s so soft and fits well.
Light weight without being see through. Love the color
I looks like a pj top  but I kept it

I am 5'2 and 136 and am kind of big-chested. I got a medium, and it is just slightly too big. The medium is 40.2 in the chest and the small is 37 inches...that is a big jump. I don't like how big the medium is, but will the small one just be way too tight? Do I just order a small and return it if it is tight? Seems like a waste to do that...this is why I get frustrated with online shopping. Sigh

评论概述: Runs big for athletic body shapes
评论详情: Very cute, really like it but wish it came in an xs. I’m 5’6”, 135 lbs, rectangular shaped and the small was a bit too big. That said, I’m not into everything being crazy oversized because I don’t have enough shape to not look like a sack of potatoes. If you have shape then it runs true to size and you’ll love this shirt.

This shirt feels nice and fits nice. I noticed that it had a huge nag all the way across the front and a large hole. The packaging was not ripped so this was packaged from the company this way. I'm retuning it, hoping to get one that's not damaged.

I ordered the orange/white polka dot. I thought the shirt shown had a bit of a soft tshirt texture. It is actually more of a rayon feel.  As someone else had mentioned, feels more like a pajama top. Not very stretchy so keep that in mind when ordering.  I haven’t worn yet so I don’t know how it washes up. I will keep since I had been looking for an orange top but this will be only for very casual wear.
This short is fine and I will wear kt but it is definately over priced.
This shirt is so comfy. It’s loose yet fitted where it needs to be. The sleeves are cuffed which gives it a sporty look but so cute it can be used as dress wear also.

评论概述: Very cute, nice thin material.. but too big
评论详情: I'm 5'4, 111lbs. The Small was too big, sleeves were too long (excessive bunching at the wrist) and the torso was too long as well. Would work for wearing around the house but too large and baggy to wear out. Returning. Wish there was an XS option.
